original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, posts as p WHERE pl.PostId = p.Id AND c.PostId = p.Id AND v.PostId = p.Id AND ph.PostId = p.Id AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-06-14 13:31:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-06-14 13:31:35'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.PostId=E2.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E3E2E4.PostId=E5.Id)
